command.description: Command-line tool to release new versions of composer modules.

option.name: branch
option.description: Remote branch to use for release. If not specified, "master" is used.

option.name: message
option.description: Message to use for the release tag.

option.name: type
option.description: Release type. Must be one of "major", "minor", or "micro". If not specified, "minor" is used.

option.name: verbose
option.description: Sets verbosity level. Use multiples for more detail (e.g. "-vv").
